text: For decades, if we wanted to see inside the brain,

you need to speak with Maxine's medical proxy.

Okay. Okay.

Life?

Trey.
Piece of crap.
Whoa! Hey! Hey, hey!

Most people believe that Alzheimer's is related

People, as in, the top scientists in the field.
You mean the people with the loudest voices,
and they will shame anyone who believes any other theory

and that's where most of the funding goes.
And the only meds that are approved
are meds that reduce plaque,
and those meds are supposedly reducing the plaque.
Woop!
Is that not a good thing?
Well, it would be if we could trust

I met a young neuroscientist out of Tennessee,
and he found evidence of image-tampering
in some of the leading papers.
How long is she gonna do this?
I need to present an award.
Meredith, when's the last time you slept?
Well, Jackson had to go to London to manage a crisis,
so I called all of you here
because you all know me better than anyone else does.

Run what past us?
My possible new theory on Alzheimer's.
Let me show you more data.
Oh, thank God!

You look...
Whew.
That's a dress.
And your hair...
Wow.
Wow, yourself.

Yeah.

Thank you.
You're welcome.
You know I'm Team Skywalker.

the chief respects me,
and I don't need to get dragged down

Well, I'm the one who got punched.

Okay, I...

On it.
Keep an eye on Sam Sutton for me.

I didn't leave you for another man.
I didn't. I left...
because I...

After everything that's happened,

After Baltimore.

Yes.

Trey.

and I didn't.

feeling the blood all over me

replaying it over and over in my mind.
I don't have to yell at you because I've been there,
and I know you're already doing it to yourself.
I saved a life.
I didn't end one.
He's making it really hard not to yell at him.
What?
Olympic Village.
Ah.

Sorry.
It's fine.

She's brave.
She's like no one I've ever met,
and she's generous with her advice.
And the way she gives it...
reminds me a little of my mom.
She worries about me.
She doesn't always come out and say it, but...
she'll leave a plate of food out,

She'll "accidentally" wash my towels

She...
She worries.
My own parents never really did that for me.
She's awake.
Max.
Max, Max, Max.

I do believe that we have been focused on...

Dr. Grey.

Tom Jones.
We'll play Tom Jones.
You're not Yasuda.
No, she got called into the O.R.,

Let me guess, the other guy looks worse?
It's nothing.
Disgruntled patient?
Actually... yes.
You don't have to worry about me.
You could be terrible,

You need to rest.
Yeah, yeah, I'll just lie here.

There's a girl.
Okay, you just don't need to finish.

I feel funny.

Code blue.
Rest up, okay?

Like someone took kryptonite out of my shoe.
But I'm still coming down

so might be that, too.

Sam Sutton.
Dr. Wilson must have left,

Alright, we need to get him up to the O.R. right now.
I already asked them to get it ready.
Alright, meet me up there, and prep him as fast as you can.

Taking a break.
Out here?
It's quieter.
Or it was.
You want me to leave?
Is that what you want?
What is going on with you?
Just wondering what you want, that's all.
I... I think that you should move out.
I've been thinking about it for a while.
I think that it's...
confusing for the kids.
So, this is about the kids?

Sam?
No, no, not necessarily, but yeah,

Well, you seem to be doing just fine.

I've been too busy packing lunches

Why do I feel like you're accusing me of something?
I have changed my entire life to revolve around you, us.
I never asked you to!
And now, the moment that we've all been waiting for,
the Catherine Fox Award.
This award is given to those who have achieved excellence

Here to present this year's winner

one of our most well-known boundary pushers,
Dr. Meredith Grey.

Sorry I'm late. H...

gene editing.

Dr. Fox, in her infinite wisdom,

For the first time ever, the award is going to go

We are in the midst
of a national public health crisis in this country.

women are being forced to carry not only unwanted pregnancies,

They are legally prohibited from receiving care

And with these bans,
doctors are no longer being trained

But there is one doctor who is trying to change all of that,

one trainee at a time,
whose groundbreaking work in protecting reproductive rights

we would love to present you with the Catherine Fox Award
for your significant contribution

Get up there. Go!
Oh, my God.
Congratulations, and thank you.
Yeah!
Okay, okay, okay.

Hi.

Okay.

I mean, kind of. Yeah.

Hey, thanks to us.

should we get divorced?

Well, if it makes you feel any better,

Hmm?

Do you want to come?

when we were on the plane and it started to go down,

Bailey knocked it out of my hand,
